Package net.nextinfinity.core.item

Class ItemBuilder

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.nextinfinity.core.item.ItemBuilder

  • public class ItemBuilder
extends java.lang.Object
    The ItemBuilder allows for construction of ItemStacks in a manner which is slightly more visually pleasant.

      • setLore

        public void setLore​(java.lang.String lore)
        Sets the lore of the item. A line break character is used to denote line breaks for a single String argument instead of a String array.
        Parameters:
        lore - the new lore of the item

      • addNBTTag

        public void addNBTTag​(java.lang.String tag)
        Adds an NBT tag to an item. Functionally, this sets an NBT boolean with the given key to true.
        Parameters:
        tag - the NBT tag to add
